metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2672 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Oracle Mojarra 2.1.7 does not properly "clean up" the FacesContext reference during startup, which allows local users to obtain context information an access resources from another WAR file by calling the FacesContext.getCurrentInstance function.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to Debian: Only affected in combination with EAP6/AS7 application servers, not shipped in Debian

criterions.comment: mojarra: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
